info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 7:02PM CDT until April 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HENDERSON...SOUTHEASTERN GIBSON...CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 702 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Fairview, or 8 miles south of Milan, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Milan, Huntingdon, Three Way, Atwood, Parkers Crossroads, Wildersville, Medina, Hollow Rock, Clarksburg, McLemoresville, Howley, Hickory Flat, Hillard, Dollar, Cedar Grove, Ledbetter, Union Cross, Leach, Sitka and Tate. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
